body: As Kylo, and some of the older players know, back in the good old days of MCZone,  Castle Adventure was a very popular map made by Jessamania. Some of us want Castle Adventure, and other MCZone  maps back.
body_tagged: As Kylo, and some of the older players know, back in the good old days of MCZone,  Castle Adventure was a very popular map made by Jessamania. Some of us want Castle Adventure, and other MCZone  maps back.
title: Bring Castle  Adventure Back!!

replies.body: I know it's still here, but it's not as popular as it used to be.

replies.body: Actually, Mix01 is the only Mix server working, so it won't really do any change as of now

replies.body: Castle Adventure rotates in DTM02, Mix01 and MCZone01. It is actually the only map that thrice in rotations, so... it actually plays much more than other maps.
